let me know if you need more info...
getting the following weird error in one of my projects. don't think there is anything i can do about but you might want to know so here goes:
Looks like a filehandle got mis-allocated by our PTY module- we've seen it happen under high load.
The new backend - which is close to release - separates the PTYs into subprocesses for this reason.
@andrewgodwin I've seen these a couple of times as well
Yeah, we've seen the opposite end a few times as well (output printing to stdout) - as I said, we've fixed this by separating things by process in the new back end.
